content.question: The new developments in campaigning described in the passage have the greatest impact on which of the following trends?

choices.label: The reduction of limits on campaign donations
The increase in unity within political parties

topic.text: 5.4: How and Why Political Parties Change and Adapt

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the argument or perspective in the source relates to political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
